details:
Several vulnerabilities were discovered in Apache Traffic Server, a reverse
and forward proxy server, which could result in HTTP request smuggling, cache
poisoning or information disclosure.


For Debian 10 buster, these problems have been fixed in version
8.1.6+ds-1~deb10u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your trafficserver packages.


For the detailed security status of trafficserver please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/trafficserver>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
